answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found a few resources that might be a helpful start.
Washoe County, NV has used last chance agreements in the past. You can read about their use of the agreements here.
http://wcea.us/lastchance.php
This article from the American Bar Association American Law Institute discusses the pros and cons of last chance agreements.
http://files.ali-aba.org/thumbs/datastorage/lacidoirep/articles/PL_TPL0512-Lee_thumb.pdf
This article describes how last chance agreements can become a problem if not written carefully.
http://www.venable.com/files/Publication/53010dc1-7395-437f-bfe6-52c48463c4d8/Presentation/PublicationAttachment/5a3470ae-9dae-4b80-9e21-3d8e7a9d1c0d/1509.pdf
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Elliott Nelson
text:
Hello, 
A Northern New York is interested if anyone has experience using Last Chance Agreements. If so, could you please send along a copy of your agreement and a brief synopsis of your experience with it. Did you feel that it was an effective management tool in communicating to an employee that it was their “last chance?” Please share your experiences.
Please feel free to respond in email: ENelson@Watertown-NY.gov
Thank you very much.
title: Last Chance Agreements
